docs.text: resource-proxy A dropwizard bundle to proxy resource request
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: A dropwizard bundle to proxy resource request
docs.title: resource-proxy

docs.text: resource-proxy java bootstrap.addBundle(new ResourceProxyBundle ResProxyAppConfiguration () { protected ResourceProxyBundleConfiguration getRequestProxyConfiguration(ResProxyAppConfiguration configuration) { return configuration.getResourceProxyBundleConfiguration(); } });
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: java bootstrap.addBundle(new ResourceProxyBundle ResProxyAppConfiguration () { protected ResourceProxyBundleConfiguration getRequestProxyConfiguration(ResProxyAppConfiguration configuration) { return configuration.getResourceProxyBundleConfiguration(); } });
